response.overview: Student loans are expensive. Computer science student Will Meyers knows this, and he needs the money for them... quick. To get it, he accepts a shady job covering up a Bitcoin transfer, but he quickly finds that he got more than he bargained for...
response.tagline: An unassuming computer science student botches the cover-up of a shady Bitcoin transfer and is sucked into a world of crime.
response.title: Need Money Quick?
